message.content:
cs.SC, cs.NA, cs.SY, cs.DS, cs.LO. 

The paper deals with numerical methods for polynomial systems, which are often studied in the subfield of scientific computing (cs.SC). The use of derivatives and linear combinations suggests that numerical analysis (cs.NA) may also be relevant. The paper proposes a new technique for refining or verifying solutions, which falls under the category of control and systems theory (cs.SY). The use of acceleration strategies and analysis of tolerances suggests that the paper may also be relevant to the subfields of dynamical systems (cs.DS) and optimization (cs.LO).
